channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 19:14 Air alarm to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 19:14 Air alarm to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast follow the following messages.#Dnepropetrovsk_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 17:50 pm alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirovsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community

Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirovsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
